version_description:
• Added missing translation strings
• Fixed bug sometimes causing a crash when chossing a contraceptive brand name

• Added missing translation strings
• Fixed bug sometimes causing a crash when chossing a contraceptive brand name
• Fixed notifications of private messages
• Fixed notifications of private messages
• Fixed a crash on iOS 8 devices, when a message is shown within the app.
• Fixed a crash on iOS 8 devices, when a message is shown within the app.

• Improved chat user interface, it looks and works better now.
• Improved forum search, now it's much faster.

• Improved chat user interface, it looks and works better now.
• Improved forum search, now it's much faster.

• Fixed crash of signed in users on 32-bit devices (iPhone 5/5s).
• Fixed profile picture upload.

• Fixed crash of signed in users on 32-bit devices (iPhone 5/5s).
• Fixed profile picture upload.

• Fixed crash when viewing a pamphlet
• Fixed error when disabling or enabling forum notifications

• Fixed crash when viewing a pamphlet
• Fixed error when disabling or enabling forum notifications

• Fixed bug prevented users from inviting other forum users to chat.
• Fixed bug prevented ignoring other forum users from working.

• Fixed bug prevented users from inviting other forum users to chat.
• Fixed bug prevented ignoring other forum users from working.

• Refreshed calendar screen! Looks better and easier to navigate.
• Fixed "Ignore user" option on the forum.

• Refreshed calendar screen! Looks better and easier to navigate.
• Fixed "Ignore user" option on the forum.

• Renewed and fixed myPill's Today Widget, it now works well and looks better.
• Fixed a crash ocurring when deleting an option from a new poll post on the forum.
• Fixed a crash when reinstalling the app without backup.
• Fixed a crash when tapping a list element on the calendar screen.

• Renewed and fixed myPill's Today Widget, it now works well and looks better.
• Fixed a crash ocurring when deleting an option from a new poll post on the forum.
• Fixed a crash when reinstalling the app without backup.
• Fixed a crash when tapping a list element on the calendar screen.
• Fixed a bug causing free features to require an upgrade for some users.
• Fixed a bug causing free features to require an upgrade for some users.

• Protection status supports taking two pills pack back to back!
• Updated into using the new iOS notifications framework.

• Protection status supports taking two pills pack back to back!
• Updated into using the new iOS notifications framework.

• Fixed bug in protection status for packs with more than 28 pills.
• Fixed crash when opening blocked users screen.

• Fixed bug in protection status for packs with more than 28 pills.
• Fixed crash when opening blocked users screen.

• Fixed a bug causing timezone retention to not work when changing timezone.
• Rearranged pack screen, new ring & patch usage indication.
• Fixed timezone bug on the calendar
• New theme selection screen
• Fixed suggestion to start a new pack when ring taken out early.
• Fixed presentation of prediction for ring and patch.
• Fixed a bug causing days with multiple events to not show past taken action in calendar.
• Fixed bug causing to taken action of events to not be loaded on calendar (past events not shown)
• Fixed a bug causing write of wrong taken action when placing a ring or patch. This caused a wrong calculation of proteciton status.

• Fixed a bug causing timezone retention to not work when changing timezone.
• Rearranged pack screen, new ring & patch usage indication.
• Fixed timezone bug on the calendar
• New theme selection screen
• Fixed suggestion to start a new pack when ring taken out early.
• Fixed presentation of prediction for ring and patch.
• Fixed a bug causing days with multiple events to not show past taken action in calendar.
• Fixed bug causing to taken action of events to not be loaded on calendar (past events not shown)
• Fixed a bug causing write of wrong taken action when placing a ring or patch. This caused a wrong calculation of proteciton status.

• Fixed a bug causing ring / patch themes to change into pill theme.
• Fixed display issue of packs with more than 28 pills, like seasonal packs.
• Fixed crash that may occur once after restoring data from a backup.

• Fixed a bug causing ring / patch themes to change into pill theme.
• Fixed display issue of packs with more than 28 pills, like seasonal packs.
• Fixed crash that may occur once after restoring data from a backup.

• Fixed pill pack display bug ocurring with more than 28 active pills.
• Fixed bug allowing marking future pills as 'taken' using a long press.
• Allowing marking taken future pills as 'untaken'.
• Fixed a bug causing ring users with more than 21 active days to see a wrong day count on the pack screen.

• Fixed pill pack display bug ocurring with more than 28 active pills.
• Fixed bug allowing marking future pills as 'taken' using a long press.
• Allowing marking taken future pills as 'untaken'.
• Fixed a bug causing ring users with more than 21 active days to see a wrong day count on the pack screen.

myPill 7.0!
• New pack visual themes! Check them out at the Settings screen.
• Renewed existing themes, looks much better now!
• Fixed wrong Portuguese translation for weekdays.
• Today's pill flashing indication brought back.
• Fixed drawing of pack after restoring from backup.
• App theme color separated from pack visual template on the Settings screen.
• Contraception type option separated from pack visual template on the Settings screen.

myPill 7.0!
• New pack visual themes! Check them out at the Settings screen.
• Renewed existing themes, looks much better now!
• Fixed wrong Portuguese translation for weekdays.
• Today's pill flashing indication brought back.
• Fixed drawing of pack after restoring from backup.
• App theme color separated from pack visual template on the Settings screen.
• Contraception type option separated from pack visual template on the Settings screen.

• 17 new visual pack templates!
• Improved existing visual pack templates, added weekday print to some templates.
• Fixed a crash when deleting a note by emptying its text.
• Fixed a crash when trying to restore without signing in first.
• Opening myPill in a new timezone will reschedule reminders to match the new timezone, so they would fire according to the original timezone. This happens due to iOS's User Notification framework functionality change.

• 17 new visual pack templates!
• Improved existing visual pack templates, added weekday print to some templates.
• Fixed a crash when deleting a note by emptying its text.
• Fixed a crash when trying to restore without signing in first.
• Opening myPill in a new timezone will reschedule reminders to match the new timezone, so they would fire according to the original timezone. This happens due to iOS's User Notification framework functionality change.

• Now supporting IUD, IUS & Depo Shot contraceptives!
• Improved pamphlets database, added lots of new pamphlets and now shows active substances dose!
• Fixed (hopefully for goods) app theme color.
• Fixed forum push notifications.
• You may now configure myPill to operate without using a contraception.
• You may now use Emojies in your custom reminder message!
• Insert, replace and remove indications now sets your pack start date accordingly.

• Now supporting IUD, IUS & Depo Shot contraceptives!
• Improved pamphlets database, added lots of new pamphlets and now shows active substances dose!
• Fixed (hopefully for goods) app theme color.
• Fixed forum push notifications.
• You may now configure myPill to operate without using a contraception.
• You may now use Emojies in your custom reminder message!
• Insert, replace and remove indications now sets your pack start date accordingly.
• Fixed a bug causing inability to set Break days to 0.
• Fixed a bug causing inability to set Break days to 0.
• Added validation checks for the number of active days and break days.
• Added validation checks for the number of active days and break days.

• Updates to support iOS 11
• Added iCloud backup support

• Updates to support iOS 11
• Added iCloud backup support

• Supporting iPhone X
• Updated stickers
• Improved protection status algorithm

• Supporting iPhone X
• Updated stickers
• Improved protection status algorithm

• Fixed scrolling issues on iPhone X and iOS 11
• Fixed minor usability issues.

• Fixed scrolling issues on iPhone X and iOS 11
• Fixed minor usability issues.

• Adjustments for better compliants with GDPR.
• Minor fixes and improvements.

• Adjustments for better compliants with GDPR.
• Minor fixes and improvements.
• Removed redundant `Label` title in myPill alert views.
• Removed redundant `Label` title in myPill alert views.
• Fixed crash in iPhone X upon startup, if a password was set on myPill.
• Fixed crash in iPhone X upon startup, if a password was set on myPill.

• Fixed minor issue with active/break days settings
• Updated Facebook login process
• Adjustments to latest iOS

• Fixed minor issue with active/break days settings
• Updated Facebook login process
• Adjustments to latest iOS

• Fixed bug causing app some app tabs to load incorrectly in iOS 13
• Fixed location of Settings button in the pack screen
• Fixed crash when trying to view a pamphlet
• Fixed name of custom symptom on the day's action menu

• Fixed bug causing app some app tabs to load incorrectly in iOS 13
• Fixed location of Settings button in the pack screen
• Fixed crash when trying to view a pamphlet
• Fixed name of custom symptom on the day's action menu

• Fixed bug causing settings button to be displayed wrongly on iPhone 13
• Fixed invisible controls on Dark Mode

• Fixed bug causing settings button to be displayed wrongly on iPhone 13
• Fixed invisible controls on Dark Mode
Fixed issue that was rarely causing app to crash when using the forum.
